document_data.mainbody:
akiirs Street was a road located in the city of Waterdeep.
Sakiirs Street was found in southern Waterdeep within the Dock Ward and Castle Ward. It originated on Soothsayers Way just south of the feet of Mount Waterdeep. The road passed south to end at Fishgut Court and Sail Street. Along its path Sakiirs Street was intersected by Lackpurse Lane, Rainrun Street, Belnimbras Street, and the Slide.
